cf_agent_examples.content:
Recommend[1,10]
UserSimilarity[1,5]
ItemSimilarity[50,5]
UserInfo[1]
ItemInfo[50]
Finish[Top 10 CF recommendations for user 1]

cf_agent_fewshot.content:
For user 1 requesting 10 recommendations:
Recommend[1,10]
(returns items that similar users liked)

For analyzing user preferences:
UserSimilarity[1,3]
(returns users with similar rating patterns)
ItemSimilarity[100,5]
(returns items similar to what user liked)

Finish[Based on collaborative filtering, user 1 should like these items that similar users rated highly]

cf_agent_hint.content: Focus on collaborative patterns - users who liked the same items should have similar preferences.
